name: mikroe.click.proximity20
short_description: Proximity 20 Click is a compact add-on board for short-range proximity sensing applications up to 200mm. This board features two VCNL36828P proximity sensors from Vishay Semiconductor. Key features include a 940nm VCSEL for immunity to a red glow, intelligent cancellation technology to minimize crosstalk, and a smart persistence scheme for reduced measurement response time.
